description:
QT’s new fascination with fishing leads to chaos when the little robot hooks an extremely rare alien with the ability to impersonate any living thing. Is the world ready for more than one Dandy?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daremo Shiranai Chameleon Seijin Jan yo
Nobody Knows the Chameleon Alien, Baby
Personne ne connaît l`alien caméléon, baby
誰も知らないカメレオン星人じゃんよ
